video.title: What do computer programmers actually do?
video.description:
What do programmers actually do? What can they be working on? Learn from Luba, an Airbnb software engineer.

Check out Luba's YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgzKCeDYLRzPhQ64R6AKyBQ

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.author: Life of Luba
topLevelComment.text:
Hey everyone! Here’s my channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgzKCeDYLRzPhQ64R6AKyBQ 

What is the most important thing in a programmers job?

topLevelComment.author: Michael Summers
topLevelComment.text: I .kow, I know,  I don't even have to watch the video. I write 1/2 of code and then spend a zillion hours trying to debug the code. Then I end up asking my co-worker for help. When I submit my assignment the team leader ask if I had a well-paid vacation...
